l>proc main_F0:
   0:     LOG_FORMAT _L0 numargs=0 string="MicroCode start!"_S3
   5:     JMP 25 (+17) IF NOT role_is_connected(soundLevel_0_R1)
  12:     SETUP_PKT_BUFFER size=1
  14:     SET_PKT 00_S5 offset=0
  18:     SEND_CMD soundLevel_0_R1 code=8193
  25:     _L0 := dotMatrix_0_R2
  29:     _L1 := 0001000000000001000000000001000000000002000000000400000000080000001000000010000000100000000800000000040000000002000000000000000000_S7
  33:     _L2 := 30
  36:     CALL _L0 numargs=3 func=_l_dot_animation_F2
  41:     CALL _L0 numargs=0 func=startPage1_F3
  46:     RETURN 0


l>proc stopPage_F1:
   0:     RETURN 0


l>proc _l_dot_animation_F2:
   0:     _L0 := 0
   3:     JMP 47 (+38) IF NOT (_L0 < object_length(_P1))
  13:     SETUP_PKT_BUFFER size=5
  15:     BLIT dst=pkt_buffer() dst_offset=0 src=_P1 src_offset=_L0 length=5
  23:     SEND_CMD _P0 code=8194
  30:     SLEEP_S (_P2 / 1000)
  38:     _L0 := (_L0 + 5)
  44:     JMP 3 (-41)
  47:     RETURN null()
          .fill 0x00
          .fill 0x00
          .fill 0x00


l>proc startPage1_F3:
   0:     CALL _L0 numargs=0 func=stopPage_F1
   5:     SLEEP_MS 50
   7:     page_G0 := 1
  10:     SEND_CMD pageStart_R0 code=128
  15:     RETURN 0


l>0: "pageStart"

l>1: "main"

l>2: "stopPage"

l>3: "MicroCode start!"

l>4: "soundLevel_0"

l>5: 00

l>6: "dotMatrix_0"

l>7: 0001000000000001000000000001000000000002000000000400000000080000001000000010000000100000000800000000040000000002000000000000000000

l>8: "_l_dot_animation"

l>9: "startPage1"

   0:     LOG_FORMAT _L0 numargs=0 string="MicroCode start!"_S3
   5:     JMP 25 (+17) IF NOT role_is_connected(soundLevel_0_R1)

  14:     SET_PKT 00_S5 offset=0
  18:     SEND_CMD soundLevel_0_R1 code=8193
  25:     CALL_BG _L0 numargs=0 func=button_0_disp_F4  bg (max1)
  31:     CALL_BG _L0 numargs=0 func=button_1_disp_F7  bg (max1)

  58:     RETURN 0

   0:     TERMINATE_FIBER fiber_handle=dotMatrix_0_lock_G1
   3:     dotMatrix_0_lock_G1 := null()
   6:     TERMINATE_FIBER fiber_handle=soundPlayer_0_lock_G2
   9:     soundPlayer_0_lock_G2 := null()
  12:     RETURN 0

l>proc main_F0:
   0:     LOG_FORMAT _L0 numargs=0 string="MicroCode start!"_S3
   5:     JMP 25 (+17) IF NOT role_is_connected(soundLevel_0_R1)
  12:     SETUP_PKT_BUFFER size=1
  14:     SET_PKT 00_S5 offset=0
  18:     SEND_CMD soundLevel_0_R1 code=8193
  25:     CALL_BG _L0 numargs=0 func=button_0_disp_F4  bg (max1)
  31:     _L0 := dotMatrix_0_R2
  35:     _L1 := 0001000000000001000000000001000000000002000000000400000000080000001000000010000000100000000800000000040000000002000000000000000000_S15
  39:     _L2 := 30
  42:     CALL _L0 numargs=3 func=_l_dot_animation_F3
  47:     CALL _L0 numargs=0 func=startPage1_F6
  52:     RETURN 0


l>proc stopPage_F1:
   0:     TERMINATE_FIBER fiber_handle=dotMatrix_0_lock_G1
   3:     dotMatrix_0_lock_G1 := null()
   6:     TERMINATE_FIBER fiber_handle=soundPlayer_0_lock_G2
   9:     soundPlayer_0_lock_G2 := null()
  12:     RETURN 0


l>proc r1_0_F2:
   0:     TERMINATE_FIBER fiber_handle=dotMatrix_0_lock_G1
   3:     dotMatrix_0_lock_G1 := get_fiber_handle(func=null())
   7:     _L0 := dotMatrix_0_R2
  11:     _L1 := 0812101208_S8
  15:     _L2 := 400
  21:     CALL _L0 numargs=3 func=_l_dot_animation_F3
  26:     RETURN 0


l>proc _l_dot_animation_F3:
   0:     _L0 := 0
   3:     JMP 47 (+38) IF NOT (_L0 < object_length(_P1))
  13:     SETUP_PKT_BUFFER size=5
  15:     BLIT dst=pkt_buffer() dst_offset=0 src=_P1 src_offset=_L0 length=5
  23:     SEND_CMD _P0 code=8194
  30:     SLEEP_S (_P2 / 1000)
  38:     _L0 := (_L0 + 5)
  44:     JMP 3 (-41)
  47:     RETURN null()
          .fill 0x00
          .fill 0x00
          .fill 0x00


l>proc button_0_disp_F4:
   0:     WAIT_ROLE button_0_R3
   3:     JMP 24 (+17) IF NOT (page_G0 == 1)
  11:     JMP 24 (+10) IF NOT (pkt_ev_code() == 1)
  18:     CALL_BG _L0 numargs=0 func=r1_0_F2  bg (max1)
  24:     JMP 45 (+17) IF NOT (page_G0 == 1)
  32:     JMP 45 (+10) IF NOT (pkt_ev_code() == 1)
  39:     CALL_BG _L0 numargs=0 func=r1_1_F5  bg (max1)
  45:     JMP 0 (-45)


l>proc r1_1_F5:
   0:     TERMINATE_FIBER fiber_handle=soundPlayer_0_lock_G2
   3:     soundPlayer_0_lock_G2 := get_fiber_handle(func=null())
   7:     SETUP_PKT_BUFFER size=6
   9:     SET_PKT "giggle"_S14 offset=0
  13:     SEND_CMD soundPlayer_0_R4 code=128
  18:     SLEEP_MS 1478
  23:     RETURN 0
          .fill 0x00
          .fill 0x00
          .fill 0x00


l>proc startPage1_F6:
   0:     CALL _L0 numargs=0 func=stopPage_F1
   5:     SLEEP_MS 50
   7:     page_G0 := 1
  10:     SEND_CMD pageStart_R0 code=128
  15:     RETURN 0

l>proc main_F0:
   0:     LOG_FORMAT _L0 numargs=0 string="MicroCode start!"_S3
   5:     JMP 25 (+17) IF NOT role_is_connected(soundLevel_0_R1)

  61:     CALL_BG _L0 numargs=0 func=accelerometer_0_disp_F23  bg (max1)

  56:     CALL _L0 numargs=0 func=startPage1_F10
  61:     RETURN 0

   9:     _L0 := (10 <= _P1)

   0:     _P1 := (round(_P1) | 0)
   7:     SETUP_PKT_BUFFER size=5
   9:     _L0 := (10 <= _P1)
  15:     JMP 28 (+10) IF NOT !!_L0
  22:     _L0 := (_P1 <= 99)
  28:     JMP 77 (+47) IF NOT _L0
  34:     _L1 := idiv(_P1, 10)
  40:     _L2 := (_P1 - (_L1 * 10))
  49:     BLIT dst=pkt_buffer() dst_offset=0 src=0e11110e0000121f100019151512000911150b000c0a091f081715151509081416150811090503010a1515150a02150d05020a1f0a1f0a1f1f001f1d17151f071c171d1f1d011f1b1b171f_S9 src_offset=(55 + (_L1 * 2)) length=2
